basilMod:Whiskey.NAME: Whiskey
basilMod:Whiskey.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 extra Strength and Dexterity from basilmod:Inebriated .

basilMod:Counterspell.NAME: Counterspell
basilMod:Counterspell.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to debuff, gain !M! Artifact.

basilMod:Retribution.NAME: Retribution
basilMod:Retribution.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy inflicts a debuff, apply 2 Constricted to ALL enemies.

basilMod:Rebuttal.NAME: Rebuttal
basilMod:Rebuttal.DESCRIPTION: Deal Damage for each attack you've taken this combat and reset this card.

basilMod:Counter.NAME: Counter
basilMod:Counter.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Thorns.

basilMod:LightningRune.NAME: Lightning Rune
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Damage all enemies based on your basilmod:Runescarred.

basilMod:FlameRune.NAME: Flame Rune
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and gain Strength based on your basilmod:Runescarred.

basilMod:FrostRune.NAME: Frost Rune
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Apply Slow based on your basilmod:Runescarred.

basilMod:EarthRune.NAME: Earth Rune
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block for each enemy in combat based on your basilmod:Runescarred.

basilMod:CreepingBriars.NAME: Creeping Briars
basilMod:CreepingBriars.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns at the start of your turn.

basilMod:CurseRune.NAME: Curse Rune
basilMod:CurseRune.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL basilmod:Rune. NL At the end of your turn, lose !basilMod:RunescarredValue! HP. NL Exhaust.

basilMod:Counterbuff.NAME: Counterbuff
basilMod:Counterbuff.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to buff, apply !M! basilmod:Rust.

basilMod:TakeABreak.NAME: Take A Break!
basilMod:TakeABreak.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP for each stack of basilmod:Runescarred. NL Remove all basilmod:Runescarred. NL Exhaust.

basilMod:Cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
basilMod:Cleanse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to a random enemy for each stack of basilmod:Runescarred. NL Remove all basilmod:Runescarred. NL Not affected by strength.

basilMod:Procrastinate.NAME: Procrastinate
basilMod:Procrastinate.DESCRIPTION: Every time you draw this card, increase its effects by !M!. NL Gain !basilMod:MiscValue! stacks of basilmod:Regen, Strength, and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

basilMod:RobinHood.NAME: Robin Hood
basilMod:RobinHood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and gain !M! gold for each point of unblocked damage.

basilMod:AnotherBook.NAME: Another Book
basilMod:AnotherBook.DESCRIPTION: Add a random skill to your hand. Exhaust.
basilMod:AnotherBook.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded random skill to your hand. Exhaust.

basilMod:Runeburn.NAME: Runeburn
basilMod:Runeburn.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, do damage equal to your basilmod:Runescarred to a random enemy.
basilMod:Runeburn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, do damage equal to your basilmod:Runescarred to a random enemy.

basilMod:DueDate.NAME: Due Date
basilMod:DueDate.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Can only be played if enemy is at full HP. NL If you defeat this enemy within !basilMod:DueDateValue! turns (10% of Enemy's HP), gain !basilMod:DueDateValue! Max HP. NL Exhaust.

basilMod:FaeForm.NAME: Fae Form
basilMod:FaeForm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain a random amount of one of the following: Thorns, Artifact, Strength, or Dexterity. NL basilmod:Fickle: Draw a card.

basilMod:NockOneBack.NAME: Nock One Back
basilMod:NockOneBack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to a random enemy. NL basilmod:Fickle: Gain !M! basilmod:Inebriated.

basilMod:Shots.NAME: Shots!
basilMod:Shots.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies. NL If you have basilmod:Inebriated, increase this damage by !M!.

basilMod:Nightmares.NAME: Nightmares
basilMod:Nightmares.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Thorns. NL basilmod:Fickle: Take !M! Damage.

basilMod:Naptime.NAME: Naptime
basilMod:Naptime.DESCRIPTION: Put all enemies to sleep. NL Exhaust.

basilMod:CoinToss.NAME: Coin Toss
basilMod:CoinToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL basilmod:Fickle: Add a copy of this card to the top of your draw pile.

basilMod:Experiment.NAME: Experiment
basilMod:Experiment.DESCRIPTION: Add basilmod:Research to your hand and Exhaust. NL basilmod:Fickle: Draw !M! cards.
basilMod:Experiment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add basilmod:Research+ to your hand and Exhaust. NL basilmod:Fickle: Draw !M! cards.

basilMod:Research.NAME: Research
basilMod:Research.DESCRIPTION: The next X cards you draw cost !M! less this combat.

basilMod:DealWithIt.NAME: Deal With It
basilMod:DealWithIt.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a card, gain !M! Block.

basilMod:CoverPage.NAME: Cover Page
basilMod:CoverPage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and draw a card. NL basilmod:Fickle: Gain !M! Block (not affected by Dexterity).

basilMod:BlankRune.NAME: Blank Rune
basilMod:BlankRune.DESCRIPTION: basilmod:Rune. NL Copy the effects of another basilmod:Rune in your deck. NL Exhaust.
basilMod:BlankRune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: basilmod:Rune. NL Copy the effects of another basilmod:Rune in your deck.

basilMod:FinalsWeek.NAME: Finals Week
basilMod:FinalsWeek.DESCRIPTION: This card's cost cannot be externally modified. NL Deal !D! Damage 7 times to all enemies and Exhaust. NL basilmod:Fickle: Reduce this card's cost by !M!.

basilMod:CaffeineJitters.NAME: Caffeine Jitters
basilMod:CaffeineJitters.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to a random enemy for each stack of basilmod:Caffeine gained this combat.

basilMod:SleeplessNight.NAME: Sleepless Night
basilMod:SleeplessNight.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak to all enemies. NL basilmod:Fickle: Lose [E] and gain 2 basilmod:Caffeine.

basilMod:Counterstatus.NAME: Counterstatus
basilMod:Counterstatus.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a Status, gain !M! Block.
basilMod:Counterstatus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you draw a Status, gain !M! Block and Thorns.

basilMod:Cawcawphony.NAME: Cawcawphony
basilMod:Cawcawphony.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to a random enemy !M! times.

basilMod:FaerieRune.NAME: Faerie Rune
basilMod:FaerieRune.DESCRIPTION: basilmod:Rune. NL If you would die, Heal a percent of your Max HP based on your current basilmod:Runescarred. NL Ethereal.
basilMod:FaerieRune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: basilmod:Rune. NL If you would die, Heal a percent of your Max HP based on your current basilmod:Runescarred.

basilMod:CrowRune.NAME: Crow Rune
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain Flight based on your basilmod:Runescarred.

basilMod:FaerieDust.NAME: Faerie Dust
basilMod:FaerieDust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage for each enemy in combat. NL basilmod:Fickle: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies.
